item.title: [508] how do i add more then 1 drop and make it random[508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“teh0wn ltd, post:1, topic:311195”]ok so i decided to take the make imp’s lootable into my own hands.
i got 1 item to work but i cant get any more this is what i have in itemonitem.java

if(itemUsed == 2347 && usedWith == 11256 || itemUsed == 11256 && usedWith == 2347) { pi.deleteItem(player, 11256, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11256), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You smash the jar, the imp pop's,and out comes a random item O.O."); pi.addItem(player, 995, 100000); }
i wanna add all the drop on rs “and some custom my self ;)” so any1 whos good with 508 "[size=20pt]davidi2[/size] clockwise27 and others please help out your fellow coder “when i open i will add credits to all!!!”[/quote]

Read full topic
